sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect, useState} from 'react' import Plus from '../Assets/images/Plus.svg' import CommonDropDown from './CommonDropDown'; const Inputarea = (props) => { const [designer,setDesigner]= useState(0); const[frontEnd,setFrontEnd]= useState(0); const[backEnd,setBackEnd]= useState(0); const[qa,setQA]= useState(0); return(props.output)?(
Designer
setDesigner(designer+1)} src={Plus}/> {designer} setDesigner(designer-1)}src={Plus}/>
Front End Developer
setFrontEnd(frontEnd+1)}src={Plus}/> {frontEnd} setFrontEnd(frontEnd-1)}src={Plus}/>
Back End Developer
setBackEnd(backEnd+1)}src={Plus}/> {backEnd} setBackEnd(backEnd-1)} src={Plus}/>
QA
setQA(qa+1)}src={Plus}/> {qa} setQA(qa-1)} src={Plus}/>
):""; } export default Inputarea;
